head.title: Boy, 11, Is Found Dead On His School Bus

identified-content.classifier: Top/News/U.S./U.S. States, Territories and Possessions/New York

hedline.hl1: Boy, 11, Is Found Dead On His School Bus

abstract.p: Anthony Anselm, 11-year-old Queens boy, is found dead on his school bus after it arrives at school in Maspeth section of New York City (S)

block.p: An 11-year-old Queens boy was found dead on his school bus yesterday morning after the bus arrived at the Walter Reed School in Maspeth, the police said.

The boy, Anthony Anselm of 183-24 Elmira Avenue in Hollis, was found dead at 8:18 a.m. by a bus matron. The school nurse and several others performed CPR in an attempt to revive the boy, but he was pronounced dead at Elmhurst General Hospital.
An 11-year-old Queens boy was found dead on his school bus yesterday morning after the bus arrived at the Walter Reed School in Maspeth, the police said.

The boy, Anthony Anselm of 183-24 Elmira Avenue in Hollis, was found dead at 8:18 a.m. by a bus matron. The school nurse and several others performed CPR in an attempt to revive the boy, but he was pronounced dead at Elmhurst General Hospital.
Law enforcement officials said the boy, who took an undisclosed medication, often fell asleep on the bus and had to be awakened. An autopsy was scheduled for today.
